entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, being followed by people from the Order of the Phoenix.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A powerful wizard and headmaster of Hogwarts, who is angry when he finds out Mundungus left before his shift ended.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who saw Dumbledore's reaction to Mundungus leaving early.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: A wizard who left his shift early, causing Dumbledore's anger.

entities.name: order of the phoenix
entities.description: An organization that has been following Harry.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Harry's home address, where he would have stayed if Mundungus hadn't left early.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: A government-like organization that deals with magical matters.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is angry at Mundungus for leaving early.
The Order of the Phoenix has been following Harry.
Dumbledore would have left Harry at Privet Drive if Mundungus hadn't left early.
Harry is not worried about the Ministry of Magic hearing.
